**Indoor Firearms Range Facility - Tender Announcement**

### Tender Details
| Title              | French Title               |
|---------------------|----------------------------|
| Reference Number   | cb-50-6296888             |
| Amendment Number   | 3                          |
| Solicitation Number | PR129983                   |
| Publication Date    | January 22, 2024           |
| Tender Closing Date | February 6, 2024 at 14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date     | February 6, 2024           |

### Tender Description
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites suppliers to submit tender bids for the rental services of an indoor firearms range facility in Quebec City. The facility is required for Border Services Officers' firearms training.

**Scope of Work**

- Provide an indoor firearms range for approximately 20 days per year
- Furnish safety procedures

**Contract Period**

- The contract period is from February 15, 2024 to December 31, 2024, with an option to extend the contract by four (4) additional one-year periods.

**Supplier Right to Submit a Statement of Capabilities**

Suppliers who consider themselves qualified and available to provide the services described in the ACAN (Advance Contract Award Notice) may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person, Marie-Pier Leblanc, at [marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca) on or before the closing date.

### Tendering Procedure

E-mails for submissions should be addressed to Marie-Pier Leblanc at [marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca). Please access the tender documents from the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30011/pr129983---acan_fr.pdf>.

**Contact Information**

* Name: Marie-Pier Leblanc
